playlists.name: Building Themes
playlists.description: Atmospheric music from the various buildings and facilities around your town—from the peaceful Museum to the bustling Town Hall.

playlists.name: Downtown Music
playlists.description: The bustling sounds of Main Street—day and night variations that capture the energy of shopping and socializing in your town's commercial district.

playlists.name: Miscellaneous
playlists.description: Unique tracks including the main theme, prologue music, Tortimer Island adventures, and various game events that add character to your New Leaf experience.

songs.title: Prologue - Where Do You Want Your House
songs.subtitle: Animal Crossing: New Leaf

songs.title: Tortimer Island - Hide and Seek - Fast
songs.subtitle: Animal Crossing: New Leaf

songs.title: Welcome to Our Village! (Not the Mayor)
songs.subtitle: Animal Crossing: New Leaf

playlists.name: Shop Themes
playlists.description: Cozy, nostalgic shop tunes from Animal Crossing: New Leaf—gentle jingles and friendly chimes that make your day feel like a stroll through T&T Emporium.

playlists.name: Special Events
playlists.description: Festive music from holidays and special occasions throughout the year—from Bunny Day to Toy Day, capturing the joy of seasonal celebrations.

playlists.name: Village (Clear)
playlists.description: Clear weather hourly music from Animal Crossing: New Leaf that changes throughout the day, creating the perfect ambient soundtrack for sunny days.

playlists.name: Village (Rainy)
playlists.description: Rainy weather hourly music from Animal Crossing: New Leaf that changes throughout the day, creating the perfect ambient soundtrack for rainy days.

playlists.name: Village (Snowy)
playlists.description: Snowy weather hourly music from Animal Crossing: New Leaf that changes throughout the day, creating the perfect ambient soundtrack for winter days.
